price: Kuma ka buga musu misãli: Waɗansu ma'abũta alƙarya, a lõkacin da Manzanni* suka jẽ mata.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: * Su Manzannin Ĩsã ne zuwa Antãkiya, bãbban garin kasar Rũmu. Sũ ne Yõhana da Pulis. Na uku, shĩ ne sham'ũn. Mutumin da ya jħ yanã gaggawa, shi ne Habĩb Masassaki wanda ya fãra gamuwa da Manzannin farko, ya yi ĩmãni da su, sa'an ya jħ yanã wa'azi ga mutãnensa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
